title.rendered: Hollywood Lace Introduces Ground-breaking HD Silicone Skin Hair System

content.rendered:
The distinctive HD Silicone Skin Hair System is one of the most exciting developments in men’s hair replacement systems today.

ORLANDO, FLORIDA, UNITED STATES, November 19, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — Hollywood Lace, a division of Swiss Lace Direct LLC, renowned for its leadership in the men’s hair system industry, proudly unveils itsQ latest innovation – the High-Definition Silicone Skin Hair System. This new addition represents a significant leap forward in men’s hairpieces, combining the esteemed Hollywood Lace front hairline with a fully breathable, thin skin silicone hair base.

This state-of-the-art HD Silicone Skin Hair System is poised to redefine the standards in the men’s hair replacement sector. “We are thrilled to present what we believe is one of the most advanced hair systems available today,” says William Richter, CEO of Hollywood Lace. “The unique combination of our Hollywood Lace front with the silicone skin base offers a seamless and exceptionally natural appearance, where the hair seems to be growing directly from the scalp.”

The HD Silicone Skin Hair System offers men a host of game-changing features, including:

• A soft, durable, and fully breathable silicone skin base

• Easy attachment process ensuring a secure and comfortable fit

• Scalloped poly perimeter for optimal maintenance and hold

• The appearance of hair growing naturally from the scalp

• And much more

At its very core, the system is designed for those who seek the utmost in realism, comfort, and durability in their men’s hair replacement systems. “Our aim was to create a product that not only looks indistinguishable from natural hair but also provides a level of comfort and ease of use that our clients have come to expect from Hollywood Lace,” Richter added.

The HD Silicone Skin Hair System is now available for those looking to experience the latest in technology in men’s hair toupees. Interested customers are encouraged to place their orders today for this advanced hair system, ensuring they are among the first to benefit from this innovative solution.

For more information about Hollywood Lace, or to place an order, please visit www.hollywoodlace.com.

About the Company

Hollywood Lace was founded by a group of hair system toupee wearers who were dissatisfied with the extensive amount of time it took to order and receive their hair pieces, the lack of professional customer service, and the inconsistent quality of the toupees received. As a result of their experiences, they made the decision to invest in a hair toupee manufacturer of their own – giving them the ability to control the quality, customer care, production time, and cost.

With the support of innovative people in the industry, Hollywood Lace was able to develop its premium hairpieces and trademark Invisible Knots Hair System.

William Richter
Hollywood Lace
+1 954-505-7000
support@hollywoodlace.com

You just read:

News Provided By

November 19, 2023, 14:06 GMT

As a user, if you see something we have missed, please do bring it to our attention. Your help is welcome. EIN Presswire, Everyone’s Internet News Presswire,
